abstract: Did AT&T’s board ever consider the total amount of wealth that Edward E. Whitacre Jr. accumulated in his 43-year career when setting his pay?
snippet: Did AT&T’s board ever consider the total amount of wealth that Edward E. Whitacre Jr. accumulated in his 43-year career when setting his pay?
lead_paragraph: AT&T had a good year in 2006. Edward E. Whitacre Jr., the longtime telecommunications executive who shepherded the company through the 2005 merger with SBC Communications, had an outstanding one.

headline.main: For AT&T’s Chief, a 94% Increase in Pay
